ygData.subject: RE: Greetings to all
ygData.msgSnippet: I am interested how do you get him drunk. Buy beers and give him them? ... From: Lai, Martin ML [mailto:Lai.Martin.ML@bhp.com.au] Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
I am interested how do you get him drunk. Buy beers and give him them?

-----Original Message-----
From: Lai, Martin ML [mailto:Lai.Martin.ML@...]
Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 5:34 PM
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Greetings to all


From: "Lai, Martin ML" <Lai.Martin.ML@...>

Be warned that Trumpy will hold a grudge. I was coming back from South
Karana to Qeynos and agreed to bind 2 people on the docks, and just as I was
about to do it, Trumpy and a city guard (friend of his) turned up and
whacked me upside down from behind. I was *not* impressed, as I intended to
bind myself at the bank after binding the adventurers. I had to run back
again from South Karana. Argh.
I'd only killed him once before and cast root on him another time for a
friend to kill him. Both times we bought him drinks till he opened up the
conversation.

There were murmurs that if you get him absolutely drunk first then you get a
good faction hit, which cancels out the bad faction hit from killing him
afterwards. I haven't verified that.

> ----------
> From: Curtis Bennett[SMTP:die_kluge@...]
> Reply To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, 24 August 1999 6:02
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Greetings to all
>
>
> At your level, the best 2 choices are the Shining Star of Light
> or the Bloodforge hammer. Of course, you could just continue to use
> the hammer of wrath, too.
>
> To get the shining star of light requires real good Qeynos Priest of
> Life faction (and of course for you to journey to Qeynos). Be sure
> to read this quest first (it is a qeynos-based quest). The SSOL is
> a decent 1h weapon that is 6/28, weighs 5 pounds, I think, and casts
> 'cleanse', which removes negative effects.
>
> The Bloodforge hammer is also a Qeynos quest (kind of). This is what
> I did, while I was in Qeynos increased my PriestsofLife faction by
> doing the blessed oil quest, I found Trumpy Irontoe near the docks
> and killed him (green to me at 12th), and got his head. Be warned, as
> this will seriously lower your faction with some groups in Qeynos.
> The BF hammer is 13/50 2h and adds +10 to saves vs. magic. It weighs
> 10 pounds. This quest is a Kaladim quest, and you need to be amiable
> with the stormguard(I think) in Kaladim - the dwarven fighter guild.
> I think killing Crushbone orcs raises that faction, so I didn't even
> have to work on it, it was already amiable when I got there (Kaladim).
>
> I have both of these weapons. I'm trying to increase my 2h skill, but
> I switch to the SSOL when the going gets tough!
>
>
> Ergo 13th level high elf cleric on test server
>
>
>
EOM
